component.name: YouTube Music
component.summary: YouTube Music Desktop App - including custom plugins

description.p: Electron wrapper around YouTube Music featuring:

ul.li: Native look & feel, aims at keeping the original interface
Framework for custom plugins: change YouTube Music to your needs (style, content, features), enable/disable plugins in one click

description.p:
See [changelog](https://github.com/th-ch/youtube-music/blob/master/changelog.md#v336) for the list of updates and the full diff.
Thanks to all contributors! üèÖ
(Note for Windows: `YouTube-Music-Web-Setup-v3.3.6.exe` is an installer, and `YouTube-Music-v3.3.6.exe` is a portable version)
